Boats Animator 0.7.3

  • Posted: 2016-11-25 11:08:39 +0000
  • Author: Charlie Lee

Boats Animator 0.7.3 is now available. This version brings a number of new keyboard shortcuts which can be found in the online documentation. The appearance of notifications in the program has also been improved.
